attributes.additional_details:
To reverse the goverments decission due to come in next month that will ask internet/phone companies to install hardware enabling GCHQ - the Government's electronic 'listening' agency - to examine 'on demand' any phone call made, text message and email sent, and website accessed in 'real time'.

I would suggest they look at new software that singles out keywords to do with terrorism rather than waste time and tax payers money listeing to all of Great Britain at once thus restoring are right to privacy.
